tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was a first time visit but it did not seem to be like that after the consultation. Dr Rachna explained the problem in detail and gave a fair estimate of how much it would be costing. Well an amazing and painless experience. Would surely recommend people who care for their oral health to visit KB Dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Rachna and Dr Balaji  both were very friendly and they explained everything in detail. They suggested not only for dental problems but also for other health issues.
Thank you Dr's.
Dr racha is a wonderful doctor. Will only recommend her for any dentist issues. Fabulous work done by her. Thank  so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Good place for all dental problems under one roof.  Minimum waiting time. Personal care and approaches. Friendly talk   Maximum satisfaction. Good follow up and reviews. Strongly recommend. 5 Star Ratings.
